text: Nguyena owadala amazulu nomhlaba ezinsukwini eziyisithupha wayesezibeka esihlalweni sobukhosi, wazi konke okungena emhlabeni nakho konke okuphuma kuwona kanye nakho konke okwehlela phansi okuphuma ezulwini nakho konke okunyukela khona futhi yena ukanye nani noma ngabe yikuphi lapho nikhona futhi uMvelinqangi uyakubona lokho enikwenzayo
